org.hackystat.sensorbase.resource.projects
Class ProjectsResource

java.lang.Object
  org.restlet.resource.Resource
      org.hackystat.sensorbase.resource.sensorbase.SensorBaseResource
          org.hackystat.sensorbase.resource.projects.ProjectsResource

public class ProjectsResource
extends SensorBaseResource

Implements the Resource for processing GET {host}/projects requests to obtain an index for all Projects defined in this SensorBase for all users. Requires the admin user.

Author:
Philip Johnson

Method Detail

getRepresentation

public org.restlet.resource.Representation getRepresentation(org.restlet.resource.Variant variant)
Returns an index of all Projects for all Users, or null if the request is not authorized. This requires admin authorization.

Specified by:
getRepresentation in class SensorBaseResource
Parameters:
variant - The representational variant requested.
Returns:
The representation.
